channel.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Package_Management on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Software_Component_Package_Management on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Package_Management
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Package_Management Datatype Description This object specifies a specific type of Software Component: A package management instance. Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license. Type: string
